accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before reproducing or quoting from any materials, in whole or in part, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Agnes Wullenwaber Diary, Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Special Collections Research Center on 02/01/2010.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessioned and minimally processed in February 2010 by Ute Schechter, Warren E. Burger Archivist.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Further information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki: http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/Agnes_Wullenwaber

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Five-Year diary, 1938-1942 of an Agnes Wullenwaber of Illinois. Brief daily entries describe chores and social life with the occasional comment on political events. There are a few entries in the back regarding checks received which indicate that she worked at least for part of the time the diary was kept. For more detailed description, provided by the seller, see folder link below.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.
